mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, p.name, p.unit_id, p.mobile, uu.name as unitname FROM `user` u left join person p on u.id = p.id left join unit uu on p.unit_id = uu.id WHERE u.id = #{id};

SELECT u.id, u.username,p.mobile, p.name, p.unit_id, p.is_deleted, uu.name as unitname FROM `user` u left join person p on u.person_id = p.id left join unit uu on p.unit_id = uu.id where u.usertype_id = 0;

SELECT u.id, u.username, p.name, p.unit_id, p.mobile, uu.name as unitname FROM `user` u left join person p on u.id = p.id left join unit uu on p.unit_id = uu.id WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 AND u.id IN #{id}
SELECT * FROM unit u WHERE u.id = #{id} AND u.is_deleted = 0;

SELECT * FROM `unit` u
u.parent_id = #{id}
u.parent_id is null
and u.is_deleted = 0

SELECT u.id, p.name,p.unit_id, uu.name as unit_name ,u.username, p.mobile,p.is_deleted FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `person` p ON u.person_id = p.id LEFT JOIN `unit` uu ON p.unit_id = uu.id WHERE u.usertype_id !=1 AND p.is_deleted = 0 ORDER by p.name ;
SELECT u.id, u.username, p.name as text, p.unit_id, uu.name, p.is_deleted FROM user u LEFT JOIN person p ON u.person_id = p.id LEFT JOIN unit uu on p.unit_id = uu.id where p.name like "%"#{name}"%"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `person`(name, gender_id, level_id, speciality_id, unit_id, mobile, office_phone, home_phone, office_address, home_address, photo_path, comm, create_date, ord, education_id, url_column_4, url_column_5, url_column_1_address, url_column_2_address, url_column_3_address, url_column_4_address, url_column_5_address, unit_single_1, unit_single_2, unit_single_3, unit_single_4, unit_single_5, unit_multiple_1, unit_multiple_2, unit_multiple_3, STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_1, STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_2, STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_3, STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_4, STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_5, STANDARD_TREE_COLUMN_1, STANDARD_TREE_FX_COLUMN_4, STANDARD_TREE_FX_COLUMN_5, ministryJobTitle_id, civilianJobTitle_id, UUID) VALUES (#{name}, #{gender_id}, #{level_id}, #{speciality_id}, #{unit_id}, #{mobile}, #{office_phone}, #{home_phone}, #{office_address}, #{home_address}, #{photo_path}, #{comm}, #{create_date}, #{ord}, #{education_id}, #{political_id}, #{email}, #{RESUME}, 0, #{delete_person_id}, #{delete_ip}, #{delete_date}, #{delete_reason}, #{int_column_1}, #{int_column_2}, #{int_column_3}, #{int_column_4}, #{int_column_5}, #{int_column_6}, #{int_column_7}, #{int_column_8}, #{int_column_9}, #{int_column_10}, #{double_column_1}, #{double_column_2}, #{double_column_3}, #{double_column_4}, #{double_column_5}, #{double_column_6}, #{double_column_7}, #{double_column_8}, #{double_column_9}, #{double_column_10}, #{date_column_1}, #{date_column_2}, #{date_column_3}, #{date_column_4}, #{date_column_5}, #{date_column_6}, #{date_column_7}, #{date_column_8}, #{date_column_9}, #{date_column_10}, #{date_time_column_1}, #{date_time_column_2}, #{date_time_column_3}, #{date_time_column_4}, #{date_time_column_5}, #{date_time_column_6}, #{date_time_column_7}, #{date_time_column_8}, #{date_time_column_9}, #{date_time_column_10}, #{varchar_column_1}, #{varchar_column_2}, #{varchar_column_3}, #{varchar_column_4}, #{varchar_column_5}, #{varchar_column_6}, #{varchar_column_7}, #{varchar_column_8}, #{varchar_column_9}, #{varchar_column_10}, #{varchar_column_11}, #{varchar_column_12}, #{varchar_column_13}, #{varchar_column_14}, #{varchar_column_15}, #{text_column_6}, #{text_column_7}, #{text_column_8}, #{text_column_9}, #{text_column_10}, #{web_column_1}, #{web_column_2}, #{web_column_3}, #{standard_column_1}, #{standard_column_2}, #{standard_column_3}, #{standard_column_4}, #{standard_column_5}, #{standard_column_6}, #{standard_column_7}, #{standard_column_8}, #{standard_column_9}, #{standard_column_10}, #{url_column_1}, #{url_column_2}, #{url_column_3}, #{url_column_4}, #{url_column_5}, #{url_column_1_address}, #{url_column_2_address}, #{url_column_3_address}, #{url_column_4_address}, #{url_column_5_address}, #{unit_single_1}, #{unit_single_2}, #{unit_single_3}, #{unit_single_4}, #{unit_single_5}, #{unit_multiple_1}, #{unit_multiple_2}, #{unit_multiple_3}, #{STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_1}, #{STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_2}, #{STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_3}, #{STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_4}, #{STANDARD_FX_COLUMN_5}, #{STANDARD_TREE_COLUMN_1}, #{STANDARD_TREE_COLUMN_2}, #{STANDARD_TREE_COLUMN_3}, #{STANDARD_TREE_COLUMN_4}, #{STANDARD_TREE_COLUMN_5}, #{STANDARD_TREE_FX_COLUMN_1}, #{STANDARD_TREE_FX_COLUMN_2}, #{STANDARD_TREE_FX_COLUMN_3}, #{STANDARD_TREE_FX_COLUMN_4}, #{STANDARD_TREE_FX_COLUMN_5}, #{ministryJobTitle_id}, #{civilianJobTitle_id}, #{UUID});

INSERT INTO `user`(id,person_id,usertype_id,username,password,comm,create_date,personal_id) select #{id},#{person_id},#{usertype_id},#{username},#{password},#{comm},#{create_date},#{personal_id} from `user` where not exists (select * from `user` where username = #{username}) limit 1;
